coaches.name: Steven Barholere
coaches.headline: Oral Exam Prep (Levels B & C) | Human-Centred Coaching | Performance Confidence
coaches.bio: Steven helps public servants succeed by creating a relaxed, supportive space focused on confidence and clarity. His human-centred coaching reduces anxiety and builds real exam readiness through targeted speaking strategies.

coaches.name: Sue-Anne Richer
coaches.headline: Structured Exam Prep | Oral & Written Precision | Strategic Practice
coaches.bio: Sue-Anne offers clear, structured coaching that breaks down complex skills into simple steps. Her methodical approach helps learners gain accuracy, confidence, and results on public service language exams.

coaches.name: Erika SÃ©guin
coaches.headline: Exam Mindset | Performance Psychology | Self-Awareness
coaches.bio: Erika helps learners prepare mentally for success by building emotional control, focus, and self-understanding. Her coaching blends mindset training and performance strategies to reduce stress and improve exam confidence.

coaches.name: Preciosa Baganha
coaches.headline: Professional English | Immersive Conversations | Advanced Second Language Coaching
coaches.bio: Helping public servants refine their professional English through high-level discussions, immersive communication strategies, and real-world scenarios. She specializes in elevating workplace English fluency for presentations, meetings, and cross-cultural contexts.

coaches.name: Victor Amisi
coaches.headline: BBB/CBC Preparation | Oral Exam Simulation
coaches.bio: With years of hands-on experience mastering SLE levels from BBB to CCC, Victor offers unmatched insider insights to help federal employees succeed. His coaching style blends strategic simulations with exam-tested techniques for confident, consistent results.

coaches.name: Soukaina Mhammedi Alaoui
coaches.headline: BBB Preparation | CBC Coaching
coaches.bio: Integrating linguistic skills with cultural context, ensuring fluency in real federal workplace scenarios. Soukaina specializes in helping public servants achieve their BBB and CBC goals through culturally-aware coaching.

coaches.name: Francine Nkurunziza
coaches.headline: Executive French | Strategic Communication | Oral Exam Coaching
coaches.bio: Francine helps executives shine in briefings, strategic meetings, and oral exams with a calm, clear, and highly professional approach. She specializes in executive-level French communication for senior public servants.
